page.title: 08Stone Stiles _ Railway
page.content: Cross the stile,walking alongside the wall on your left,pass through the first gate and immediately turn right.Go through another gate next to the first one,onto a rough track.About 0.3 miles along there is a stone stile in the wall to your right;cross over and follow another stone wall which runs slightly downhill at right angles,{S.S.E.}to the end of the field. Here a stone stile leads you out onto a rough track;turn left and in a few metres pass through a {red gate}on right and continue in a {S.S.E.} direction.Cross a wire fence and go on until you reach the corner of the field and the old railway track.Pass through two old railway concrete stiles and walk downhill until you arrive at a stream,over which there is a small white bridge.
